Module Feather.Infix

val (>) : cmd -> Base.string -> cmd

Redirect Stdout

val (>>) : cmd -> Base.string -> cmd
val (>!) : cmd -> Base.string -> cmd

Redirect Stderr

val (>>!) : cmd -> Base.string -> cmd
val (<) : cmd -> Base.string -> cmd

Read file from stdin

val (&&.) : cmd -> cmd -> cmd

Same as and_

val (||.) : cmd -> cmd -> cmd

Same as or_

val (->.) : cmd -> cmd -> cmd

Same as sequence

->. binds more tightly than |. so parentheses should be used when chaining the two.
